info.title: Signal Strength

signalstrength.name: signalstrength
signalstrength.description: This Resource describes the strength of a signal by means of lqi and rssi. The Property "lqi" is a floating point number that represents Link Quality Indicator. The Property "rssi" is a floating point number that represents the received signal strength indicator.

lqi.name: lqi
lqi.description: The current value of Link Quality Indicator.

rssi.name: rssi
rssi.description: The current value of Received Signal Strength Indicator.
